title: New Features for Easy Amazon Benchmarking | Similarweb
description: Period-over-period performance and benchmarking will help you understand past performance and analyze sales numbers against the competition.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesTwo New Features for Easy Amazon Benchmarking – September Update Updates Two New Features for Easy Amazon Benchmarking – September Update Try Shopper Intelligence by Anat Avshalom , Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb 1 Min. September 30, 2021 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic New Features This Month Seeing the big picture is crucial in any industry, especially eCommerce. Understanding how your past performance and sales numbers stack up against the competition can help you make better decisions in the future, and set the right revenue and growth targets. Our two new Shopper Intelligence features will help you do just that: Brand & Category Benchmarking Period-over-Period Performance Here’s everything you need to know. 1. Brand & Category Benchmarking Compare brands and categories on Amazon side-by-side for easy benchmarking. This highly requested feature is now available with Shopper Intelligence. It enables you to quickly identify trends and growth opportunities by comparing different brands and category combinations. With the new Benchmarking module, you can: Understand which brand is winning per category Monitor trends in consumer demand through category comparison Analyze brands’ category focus by comparing a single brand across multiple categories 2. Period-over-Period Performance Analyze year-over-year (YoY) and month-over-month (MoM) performance changes. Understanding historical trends has become much more important as we try to return to pre-COVID-19 normalcy in 2021. The new period-over-period view makes it easier to benchmark performance and growth rates against past periods, putting this year’s numbers into context. With period-over-period performance, you can: Benchmark your growth rates against competitors and category averages Monitor category growth to stay on top of consumer demand and identify new category opportunities Set the right growth targets for 2022 Ready to give it a try? Don’t have access yet? Reach out to your account manager or contact us for more details. by Anat Avshalom Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb Anat, with 10+ years in marketing, creates data-driven products for eCommerce.
